name: single-spa-demo-monorepo
description: A microfrontend application built with single-spa

scripts.install:all: npm run install:root && npm run install:nav && npm run install:page1 && npm run install:page2
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:root" "npm run start:nav" "npm run start:page1" "npm run start:page2"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:root && npm run build:nav && npm run build:page1 && npm run build:page2
scripts.test:all: npm run test:root && npm run test:nav && npm run test:page1 && npm run test:page2
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:root && npm run lint:nav && npm run lint:page1 && npm run lint:page2
scripts.prettier:all: npm run prettier:root && npm run prettier:nav && npm run prettier:page1 && npm run prettier:page2
scripts.clean: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:nav && npm run clean:page1 && npm run clean:page2
scripts.clean:root: cd single-spa-demo-root-config && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo "Directory not found"
scripts.clean:nav: cd single-spa-demo-nav && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo "Directory not found"
scripts.clean:page1: cd single-spa-demo-page-1 && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo "Directory not found"
scripts.clean:page2: cd single-spa-demo-page-2 && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul || echo "Directory not found"
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:root && npm run deploy:nav && npm run deploy:page1 && npm run deploy:page2
scripts.deploy:root: cd single-spa-demo-root-config && npm run build && node ../deploy-to-s3.js root-config
scripts.deploy:nav: cd single-spa-demo-nav && npm run build && node ../deploy-to-s3.js nav
scripts.deploy:page1: cd single-spa-demo-page-1 && npm run build && node ../deploy-to-s3.js page-1
scripts.deploy:page2: cd single-spa-demo-page-2 && npm run build && node ../deploy-to-s3.js page-2
scripts.audit:fix: npm run audit:root && npm run audit:nav && npm run audit:page1 && npm run audit:page2
